sentence.Network_en: The author's elusiveness may at times be construed as evasiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个作家的晦涩文笔有时会被理解为故弄玄虚.

sentence.Network_en: For all their elusiveness, suicide rates can certainly be correlated with other social and economic indicators.
sentence.Network_cn: 相对于自杀的令人难以捉摸而言, 它却能揭示与之相关的社会问题和经济问题.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 飘忽不定(Elusiveness)减少到2点天赋点数，同时消失和致盲的冷却时间减少为45s/1.5min.该天赋现在不再影响闪避的冷却时间相位飘 …
完整攻略，带翻译_地牢魅影吧_百度贴吧 ... Poisoncraft 毒技 Elusiveness 闪避 Vengeance 复仇.
魔兽世界盗贼天赋加点_百度知道 ... Camouflage( 伪装)： Elusiveness( 狡诈)： Opportunity( 时机)：.

list.abs: While quality is subjective and a definition elusive ., 当质量是一个主观的 , 难懂的定义.
石油词汇英语翻译(EF) ... elucidation 解释 elusive reservoir 隐蔽油藏 elution chromatography 冲洗色谱法.
elusive是什么意思... ... elusive tactor ： 多变的因素 elusive character ： 不可捉摸的性格 Elusive Grapper ： 缠丝手.

entry.tran: 难以得到的;难以描述的;想不起来的；难以实现的
entry.def: Something or someone that is elusive is difficult to find, describe, remember, or achieve.

example.ex: In London late-night taxis are elusive and far from cheap.
example.tran: 在伦敦，深夜时难以打到出租车，而且车费非常贵。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being difficult to grasp or pin down;

sentences.sentence: "the author's elusiveness may at times be construed as evasiveness"

auth_sentence.content: His elusiveness, at least some of which must be put down to luck, only burnishes his legend.
auth_sentence.res_content: His elusiveness, at least some of which must be put down to luck, only burnishes his legend.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His elusiveness, at least some of which must be put down to luck, only burnishes his legend.

auth_sentence.content: So the elusiveness of the context of your concern also has me, once again, concerned.
auth_sentence.res_content: So the elusiveness of the context of your concern also has me, once again, concerned.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So the elusiveness of the context of your concern also has me, once again, concerned.

auth_sentence.content: Ah, that je ne sais quoi, the elusiveness of simplicity that we all work so hard to achieve.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ah, that je ne sais quoi, the elusiveness of simplicity that we all work so hard to achieve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ah, that je ne sais quoi, the elusiveness of simplicity that we all work so hard to achieve.
